statements: DELETE FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = 101 AND specialty = 'Cardiology';
DELETE FROM Doctors WHERE contact_number = '555-123-4567' AND speciality = 'Neurology';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 5000 AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM Patients WHERE age < 30);
DELETE FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2023-01-01' AND doctor_id IN (SELECT doctor_id FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology');
